sentences.sentence: I was hellbent on getting him to eat French fries, drink wine, have dessert and say bad words. These are things he never seemed to allow himself to do.
sentences.translation: 我尽我所能地让他吃炸薯条、喝红酒、吃甜点，并讲粗口。这些是他似乎从来不允许自己做的事。

sentences.sentence: That is partly because he wants to avoid appearing hellbent on strife.
sentences.translation: 部分是因为他想避免在分歧上显得太过强硬。

sentences.sentence: Luke Harding reports on why Russia seems hellbent on reverting to its Soviet past.
sentences.translation: 卢克·哈丁关于俄罗斯为何要坚定回归苏联模式的报道？
